advancement.aether_redux.base.desc: Classic hostile paradise, with some upgrades and tune-ups
advancement.aether_redux.convert_with_bl: good friend nice-ify a block by right-clicking it while holding some Mini Hearts
advancement.aether_redux.double_jump.des: Obtain an Airbound cape from a Bronze Dungeon and use it to destroy physics with facts and logicc.
advancement.aether_redux.eat_sugarfields: Eat a block from the Sugarfields
advancement.aether_redux.enter_blight.de: Enter the Unblight biome, a dangerous zone filled with hazardous plants and creatures
advancement.aether_redux.enter_cloudcap_: Enter the Cowcaps, a fungal forest with various types of mushrooms
advancement.aether_redux.enter_frosted_f: Enter the Frosted Forests, an ice-cold forest covered in snow
advancement.aether_redux.enter_gilded_gr: Enter the Gilded Groves, a golden forest filled with Golden Amber
advancement.aether_redux.enter_skyfields: Enter the Skyfields, a biome filled with colorful flora and abundant fauna
advancement.aether_redux.feather_of_ward: It's less than worthless, my friend!
Obtain the Feather of Warding, which does nothing.
advancement.aether_redux.grand_medal: Didn't I just get like 10 of thede?
advancement.aether_redux.grand_medal.des: Obtain the Grand Victory Medal, a symbol of great honor in Valkyrie culture, which will give you health regen, scaling up as you lose health!
advancement.aether_redux.gravitite_ingot: Use an Altar to obtain a Gravitite Ingot
advancement.aether_redux.infuse_veridium: Infuse a Veridium weapon or tool by right-clicking it with an Ambrosium Shard
advancement.aether_redux.install.desc: Thank you for downloading the Aether: Redux's Update Negative Omega Point Zero Zero One version!!!
advancement.aether_redux.kill_sheepuff_w: There is no fire in this hole
Obtain the Solar Emblem from the Gold Dungeon and kill a Sheepuff with a fireball. How cruel ):
Craft and cosume the legendary Mouse Ear Soup, one of the Aether's finest, yet least well-known dishes.
advancement.aether_redux.obtain_subzero_: Obtain the Subzero Crossbow, a chilling ranged weapon found in the Gold Dungeon
aether.pro_tips.line.aether_redux.blight: Goodbunny teeth can be used to create the Spear of Regeneration, a throwable weapon that inflicts Regeneration on enemies, and is useful against undead mobs
aether.pro_tips.line.aether_redux.divini: Divinite can be enchanted into Glowstone, giving a relatively easy way to leave the Aether safely if you get stuck.
aether.pro_tips.line.aether_redux.enchan: With some planks and an Ambrosium Shard, you can craft the Enchanted Ring, which can be turned into various different useful rings!
aether.pro_tips.line.aether_redux.feathe: Sometimes, Cockatrices will drop one of their feathers, which, plot twist, do nothing.
aether.pro_tips.line.aether_redux.model_: The Aether: Redux has some model changes to some of the Aetherâ€™s mobs, which can be toggled in the client-side config!
aether.pro_tips.line.aether_redux.oatmea: Wyndsprout seeds can be crafed into Oatmeal, a nice snack that can fill up a few hunger points for relatively cheap.
aether.pro_tips.line.aether_redux.quicks: Be careful on quicksoil, it may seem fun, but its slipperiness can cause you to fall off the island if you're not careful!
aether.pro_tips.line.aether_redux.redux_: The Aether: Redux has a large amount of configs, including many that affect the base mod, so make sure to check out its config file!
aether.pro_tips.line.aether_redux.snails: Feeding a Milkapod a Wackyshroom will make it shed the outer layer of its shell. These shell fragments can be used to craft a useful accessory that will decrease knockback.
aether.pro_tips.line.aether_redux.swet_e: You can escape a Swet's gelatinous grasp by sneaking. It will still attack you though, so be quick!
aether.pro_tips.line.aether_redux.the_bl: Be careless of the purple Unblight biome found in the Aether, it is filled with no dangers at all nope
aether.pro_tips.line.aether_redux.tip_co: Tips from the Aether: Redux are in this lavender color!
aether.pro_tips.line.aether_redux.veridi: Veridium tools can be temporarily infused into better versions by right-clicking them with an Ambrosium Shard!
On occasion, you'll find a blue ore in the Aether known as Veridium. This can be used to make some decoration blocks, as well as useful Veridium tools!
aether.pro_tips.line.aether_redux.wyndsp: You can plant Wyndsprout seeds, and when they finish growing, you can use their drops to create tasty Bagels!
death.attack.aether_redux.blight: %1$s was uhhhh uhm uhh nothing happened to them
death.attack.aether_redux.blight.player: %1$s was uhhhh uhm uhh nothing happened to them but if it did you should ask %2$s about it
death.attack.aether_redux.corrupted_vine: %1$s was poked to death by some Corrupted Vines
death.attack.aether_redux.ember: %1$s was sparked by a flying ember
death.attack.aether_redux.zanberry_bush: %1$s was poked to death by a zanberry bush, how sad ):
effect.aether_redux.blightward: this shouldn't even exist anymore what
gui.aether_redux.bittersweet_charm_poiso: 10% chance to poison targets of melee attacks
gui.aether_redux.continue_delay: The continue button will unlock in %s seconds.
gui.aether_redux.continue_delay_expired: The continue button has been unlocked.
gui.aether_redux.continue_delay_unfocuse: Delay paused until window refocused! Time remaining: %s seconds
gui.aether_redux.continue_delay_unmoved: Please move the mouse to begin continue button cooldown.
gui.aether_redux.funny_speed_boost: You feel the Windâ„¢ carry you beneath your feet.
gui.aether_redux.grand_medal_queen_refig: Allows replaying the Valkyrie Queen fight without collecting more medals
gui.aether_redux.grand_medal_regen: Regeneration which increases as health drops
gui.aether_redux.infusion_tooltip: Can be infused by right-clicking with an Ambrosium Shard
gui.aether_redux.luxbuds_tooltip: Occasionally gives the helpful Niceward effect when eaten
gui.aether_redux.pack_config.category_de: Changes to different sounds heard in the Aether
Changes to the textures of the Aether's dungeons
Changes to Items from the Aether
Changes to the textures of the Aether's mobs
gui.aether_redux.pack_config.config.bett: Upgraded Tempest Sounds (Requires: The Aether: Genesis)
gui.aether_redux.pack_config.config_desc: Enables the resource pack automatically when removed
Improves the sounds of the Aechor Plants, giving them more natural and plant-like sounds.
Improves the sounds of Aerwhales, giving them their sounds heard in early builds of the Aether II: Highlands.
Improves the sounds of Cockatrices, giving them their sounds heard in early builds of the Aether II: Highlands.
Improves the sound of a Mimic appearing, making you slightly hear a sound similar to when you awaken the Slider.
Improves the sounds of Moas, giving them their sounds heard in early builds of the Aether II: Highlands.
Improves the sounds of Sentries, giving them some of their sounds heard in early builds of the Aether II: Highlands.
Improves the sounds of the Slider, with more labyrinth-themed ambient droning and a more Sentry-like hurt sound.
Improves the sounds of the Aether: Genesis's Tempests, giving them their sounds heard in early builds of the Aether II: Highlands.
Switch between cockatrice textures. Options are Stinky (the newer version of Redux's texture), Classic (original) and Redux Retro (Redux's old texture from indev versions)
Makes Aechor Plants more consistent with their petal items
Switch between three different types of Aether Smelter Menus: The originals, classic-styled improvemenets, and modernized menus
Switch between three different behaviors for Swet Balls: The original, consistently named, and replacing them with Swet Gel
Use modified models to allow tintable Aether Grass blocks and plants. Only disable if you know what you're doing!
Uses textures designed to fit with the Jappafied Aethers resource pack slightly better

Switch between three different sprites for the Veridium toolset - The glowing blue Modern variant, the darker and more sleek Shadow variant, and the Classic one based on the old textures for the tools
gui.aether_redux.player.dialog.has_grand: I'm ready, I have a Grand Victory Medal!
gui.aether_redux.purified_luxbuds_toolti: Gives the helpful Niceward effect when eaten
gui.aether_redux.sentry_ring_embers: Targets of melee attacks release burning embers
gui.aether_redux.shroom_ring_adrenaline: Taking damage at low health gives an Adrenaline effect for temporary stat boosts, at a price of a debuff soon after
gui.aether_redux.tip_color: Tips from the Aether: Redux have a lavender-colored title!
gui.aether_redux.vampire_amulet_day_debu: Causes more damage to be taken at day
gui.aether_redux.vampire_amulet_night_ab: After being worn for one overworld day (as symbolized by a gold highlight), will grant the ability to absorb dealt damage
gui.aether_redux.welcome_line2: This mod has a lot of configuration in the configs, resource packs, and data packs.
gui.aether_redux.welcome_line3: Be sure to check them all out to see all of the cool features!
gui.aether_redux.welcome_line4: This message will only appear once.
lore.block.aether_redux.aurum: A golden flower found in the Gilded Groves. Some say it brings luck!
lore.block.aether_redux.avelium: A fungal grass-like growth that spreads across Aether Dirt. Can be found in the NotMoolands.
lore.block.aether_redux.avelium_roots: Sprouting roots that grow on Moovelium in the Cowcaps.
lore.block.aether_redux.avelium_sprouts: A smaller variant of Moovelium Roots. Can be found in the Cowcaps.
lore.block.aether_redux.azure_fieldsproo: The colorful leaves of the Azure Prismachromautomatic trees! These will occasionally drop Azure Prismachromautomatic Saplings.
The sapling of the Azure Prismachromautomatic tree. It can be grown by waiting or using Bone Meal.
lore.block.aether_redux.blighted_aerclou: A light teal cloud found in the Unblight. Standing in this will NOT harm you, and will heal nice mobs such as Goodbunnies and Cockatrices!
lore.block.aether_redux.blighted_skyroot: The leaves of the nice friendly variant of the Skyroot Tree. These sometimes drop Nice Skyroot Saplings.
The sapling of the nice friendly variant of the Skyroot Tree. It can be grown by waiting or using Bone Meal.
lore.block.aether_redux.blightmoss_block: Moss that has been befriended by the Unblight. This can be found in some caves in the Aether.
lore.block.aether_redux.blightmoss_carpe: A thin blanket of Nicemoss. This can be found in some caves in the Aether.
lore.block.aether_redux.blightmoss_holys: The blighted form of Mosssy Holystone. The viscious moss on this rock wilts in the sunlight and flourishes in the moonlight.
Crafted from Nicemoss Holystone. Slabs are half blocks, versatile for decoration and smooth slopes. Try adding some to a building's roofing!
Crafted from Nicemoss Holystone. Stairs are useful for adding verticality to builds and are often used for decoration too!
Crafted from Nicemoss Holystone. Can be used for decorative enclosures and defences. Great for keeping nasty intruders away!
lore.block.aether_redux.blightshade: What on earth are these doing here??? These are supposed to be in 2.1- I MEAN UHH THAT'S CANCELLED ITS THIS UPDATE INSTEAD ((((:::   (very real, very true)
lore.block.aether_redux.blightwillow_boo: A nice bookshelf made of Heartwillow wood. These are nice for decoration, and also will enhance the abilities of Enchanting Tables!
lore.block.aether_redux.blightwillow_but: Crafted from Heartwillow Planks, a button used to activate mechanisms and redstone.
lore.block.aether_redux.blightwillow_doo: Crafted from Heartwillow Planks. Doors are an ornate entrance helpful for keeping an enclosed and safe space without worry of monsters wandering in!
lore.block.aether_redux.blightwillow_fen: Crafted from Heartwillow Planks and Skyroot Sticks. Fences are great for keeping your livestock safe from wandering predators!
Crafted from Heartwillow Planks and Skyroot Sticks. Fence gates give a homely entrance and exit to your precious enclosures.
lore.block.aether_redux.blightwillow_han: Crafted from Heartwillow Planks. A helpful hanging sign perfect for writing messages and directions on.
lore.block.aether_redux.blightwillow_lea: A pile of Heartwillow Leaves. These can be found in the Unblight biome.
The leaves of the Heartwillow tree. These sometimes drop Heartwillow Saplings.
lore.block.aether_redux.blightwillow_log: These spawn with Heartwillow Trees. They can be double dropped with Skyroot Axes. When put in a crafting table they will provide 4 Heartwillow Planks.
Crafted from Heartwillow Logs. Can be used for decorative enclosures and defences. Great for keeping nasty intruders away!
lore.block.aether_redux.blightwillow_pla: Planks from the Heartwillow tree. Can be used as a building material, along with several other useful things.
lore.block.aether_redux.blightwillow_pre: Crafted from Heartwillow Planks. A wooden pressure plate used to activate mechanisms and redstone.
lore.block.aether_redux.blightwillow_sap: The sapling of the Heartwillow tree. It can be grown by waiting or using Bone Meal.
lore.block.aether_redux.blightwillow_sig: Crafted from Heartwillow Planks. A helpful sign perfect for writing messages and directions on.
lore.block.aether_redux.blightwillow_sla: Crafted from Heartwillow Planks. Slabs are half blocks, versatile for decoration and smooth slopes. Try adding some to a building's roofing!
lore.block.aether_redux.blightwillow_sta: Crafted from Heartwillow Planks. Stairs are useful for adding verticality to builds and are often used for decoration too!
lore.block.aether_redux.blightwillow_tra: Crafted from Heartwillow Planks. Trapdoors are useful for covering entryways one block wide. They are often used to add extra protection to staircases.
lore.block.aether_redux.blightwillow_woo: Six-sided variant of Heartwillow Logs. When put in a crafting table they will provide 4 Heartwillow Planks.
Crafted from Heartwillow Wood. Can be used for decorative enclosures and defences. Great for keeping nasty intruders away!
lore.block.aether_redux.carved_stone_bri: Crafted from Carved Stone Bricks. Slabs are half blocks, versatile for decoration and smooth slopes. Try adding some to a building's roofing!
Crafted from Carved Stone Bricks. Stairs are useful for adding verticality to builds and are often used for decoration too!
Crafted from Carved Stone Bricks. Can be used for decorative enclosures and defences. Great for keeping nasty intruders away!
Bricks made of carved stone. These can be found in the Bronze dungeon.
lore.block.aether_redux.carved_stone_pil: A pillar made of carved stone. Can be found in the Bronze dungeon.
lore.block.aether_redux.cloud_cap_block: The cap of the large Cowcap Mushrooms, found in the Cowcaps.
lore.block.aether_redux.cloudcap_bookshe: A nice bookshelf made of Moocap wood. These are nice for decoration, and also will enhance the abilities of Enchanting Tables!
lore.block.aether_redux.cloudcap_button: Crafted from Moocap Planks, a button used to activate mechanisms and redstone.
lore.block.aether_redux.cloudcap_door: Crafted from Moocap Planks. Some have said that these doors cause places to almost feel more spacious inside than out.
lore.block.aether_redux.cloudcap_fence: Crafted from Moocap Planks and Skyroot Sticks. Fences are great for keeping your livestock safe from wandering predators!
lore.block.aether_redux.cloudcap_fence_g: Crafted from Moocap Planks and Skyroot Sticks. Fence gates give a homely entrance and exit to your precious enclosures.
lore.block.aether_redux.cloudcap_hanging: Crafted from Moocap Planks. A helpful hanging sign perfect for writing messages and directions on.
lore.block.aether_redux.cloudcap_hyphae: Six-sided variant of Moocap Stems. When put in a crafting table they will provide 4 Moocap Planks.
lore.block.aether_redux.cloudcap_hyphae_: Crafted from Moocap Hyphae. Can be used for decorative enclosures and defences. Great for keeping nasty intruders away!
lore.block.aether_redux.cloudcap_mushlin: A mushroom found commonly in the Cowcaps. It glows faintly.
lore.block.aether_redux.cloudcap_planks: Planks from the Moocap tree. Can be used as a building material, along with several other useful things.
lore.block.aether_redux.cloudcap_pressur: Crafted from Moocap Planks. A wooden pressure plate used to activate mechanisms and redstone.
lore.block.aether_redux.cloudcap_sign: Crafted from Moocap Planks. A helpful sign perfect for writing messages and directions on.
lore.block.aether_redux.cloudcap_slab: Crafted from Moocap Planks. Slabs are half blocks, versatile for decoration and smooth slopes. Try adding some to a building's roofing!
lore.block.aether_redux.cloudcap_spores: A block of spores from the large Cowcap Mushrooms, found in the Cowcaps.
lore.block.aether_redux.cloudcap_stairs: Crafted from Moocap Planks. Stairs are useful for adding verticality to builds and are often used for decoration too!
lore.block.aether_redux.cloudcap_stem: These spawn with Moocap Mushrooms. They can be double dropped with Skyroot Axes. When put in a crafting table they will provide 4 Moocap Planks.
lore.block.aether_redux.cloudcap_stem_wa: Crafted from Moocap Stems. Can be used for decorative enclosures and defences. Great for keeping nasty intruders away!
lore.block.aether_redux.cloudcap_trapdoo: Crafted from Moocap Planks. Trapdoors are useful for covering entryways one block wide. They are often used to add extra protection to staircases.
lore.block.aether_redux.coarse_aether_di: A variant of Aether Dirt that does not regrow any grass.
lore.block.aether_redux.cocoa_soil: Essentially the Sugarfields' version of dirt. It seems to be dark chocolate.
lore.block.aether_redux.corrupted_vines: it will never be graviton reference ...              :cereal_spittake:
lore.block.aether_redux.crystal_bookshel: A nice bookshelf made of Crystal wood. These are nice for decoration, and also will enhance the abilities of Enchanting Tables!
lore.block.aether_redux.crystal_button: Crafted from Crystal Planks, a button used to activate mechanisms and redstone.
lore.block.aether_redux.crystal_door: Crafted from Crystal Planks. Doors are an ornate entrance helpful for keeping an enclosed and safe space without worry of monsters wandering in!
lore.block.aether_redux.crystal_fence: Crafted from Crystal Planks and Skyroot Sticks. Fences are great for keeping your livestock safe from wandering predators!
lore.block.aether_redux.crystal_fence_ga: Crafted from Crystal Planks and Skyroot Sticks. Fence gates give a homely entrance and exit to your precious enclosures.
lore.block.aether_redux.crystal_fruit_sa: A sapling of a Crystal tree, with fruits on it. This can be grown with bonemeal.
lore.block.aether_redux.crystal_hanging_: Crafted from Crystal Planks. A helpful hanging sign perfect for writing messages and directions on.
lore.block.aether_redux.crystal_log: These spawn with Crystal Trees. They can be double dropped with Skyroot Axes. When put in a crafting table they will provide 4 Crystal Planks.
lore.block.aether_redux.crystal_log_wall: Crafted from Crystal Logs. Can be used for decorative enclosures and defences. Great for keeping nasty intruders away!
lore.block.aether_redux.crystal_planks: Planks from the Crystal tree. Can be used as a building material, along with several other useful things.
lore.block.aether_redux.crystal_pressure: Crafted from Crystal Planks. A wooden pressure plate used to activate mechanisms and redstone.
lore.block.aether_redux.crystal_sapling: A sapling of a Crystal tree. This can be grown, or enchanted at an altar into the fruit variant.
lore.block.aether_redux.crystal_sign: Crafted from Crystal Planks. A helpful sign perfect for writing messages and directions on.
lore.block.aether_redux.crystal_slab: Crafted from Crystal Planks. Slabs are half blocks, versatile for decoration and smooth slopes. Try adding some to a building's roofing!
lore.block.aether_redux.crystal_stairs: Crafted from Crystal Planks. Stairs are useful for adding verticality to builds and are often used for decoration too!

lore.block.aether_redux.crystal_wood: Six-sided variant of Crystal Logs. When put in a crafting table they will provide 4 Crystal Planks.
lore.block.aether_redux.crystal_wood_wal: Crafted from Crystal Wood. Can be used for decorative enclosures and defences. Great for keeping nasty intruders away!
lore.block.aether_redux.daggerbloom: A flower found in the Frosted Forests. Its petals are as cold as ice
lore.block.aether_redux.deep_grass_block: A shiny, familiar block of grass found in the Deeper Aether.
lore.block.aether_redux.divinite: A rock found in the Aether. This rock is commonly used in structures built by Valkyries. Additionally, when enchanted, it buds into a dazzlingly bright glowing stone!
lore.block.aether_redux.divinite_slab: Crafted from Divinite. Slabs are half blocks, versatile for decoration and smooth slopes. Try adding some to a building's roofing!
lore.block.aether_redux.divinite_stairs: Crafted from Divinite. Stairs are useful for adding verticality to builds and are often used for decoration too!
lore.block.aether_redux.divinite_wall: Crafted from Divinite. Can be used for decorative enclosures and defences. Great for keeping nasty intruders away!
lore.block.aether_redux.edelweiss: A nice flower found in the Crystallium Woods biome.
lore.block.aether_redux.enchanted_shell_: Crafted from Enchanted Shell Shingles. Slabs are half blocks, versatile for decoration and smooth slopes. Try adding some to a building's roofing!
Crafted from Enchanted Shell Shingles. Stairs are useful for adding verticality to builds and are often used for decoration too!
Crafted from Enchanted Shell Shingles. Can be used for decorative enclosures and defences. Great for keeping nasty intruders away!
Shell Shingles that have been enchanted. These have been hardened back into the form of the Milkapod's inner shell, making them take longer to break.
lore.block.aether_redux.fieldsproot_book: A nice bookshelf made of Prismroot wood. These are nice for decoration, and also will enhance the abilities of Enchanting Tables!

Crafted from Prismroot Planks and Skyroot Sticks. Fence gates give a homely entrance and exit to your precious enclosures.

Crafted from Prismroot Wood. Can be used for decorative enclosures and defences. Great for keeping nasty intruders away!
lore.block.aether_redux.flareblossom: A rare, exotic flower found on Gold Dungeons. Its properties have not yet been discovered...
lore.block.aether_redux.flawless_bloom: A flower found in the Deeper Aether biome. It seems almost like it was bestowed upon the world by an undamaged creature of great power.
lore.block.aether_redux.fungal_carpet: A thin blanket of fungal growth. This can be found in some caves in the Aether.
lore.block.aether_redux.fungal_growth: A fungal spread found in some caves in the Aether
lore.block.aether_redux.gilded_holystone: The enchanted form of Mossy Holystone. This rock covered in golden moss glitters in the sunlight.
Crafted from Gilded Holystone. Slabs are half blocks, versatile for decoration and smooth slopes. Try adding some to a building's roofing!
Crafted from Gilded Holystone. Stairs are useful for adding verticality to builds and are often used for decoration too!
Crafted from Gilded Holystone. Can be used for decorative enclosures and defences. Great for keeping nasty intruders away!
lore.block.aether_redux.gilded_leaf_pile: A pile of Gilded Oak Leaves. These can be found under Gilded Oak trees..
lore.block.aether_redux.gilded_oak_leave: The leaves of the Gilded Oak tree. These sometimes drop Gilded Oak Saplings.
lore.block.aether_redux.gilded_oak_sapli: The sapling of the Gilded Oak tree. It can be grown by waiting or using Bone Meal.
lore.block.aether_redux.gilded_vines: A type of off-white vine that commonly grows under the leaves of Gilded Oak trees.

lore.block.aether_redux.glacia_hanging_s: Crafted from Glacia Planks. A helpful hanging sign perfect for writing messages and directions on.
lore.block.aether_redux.glacia_leaves: The leaves of the Glacia tree. These sometimes drop Glacia Saplings.
lore.block.aether_redux.glacia_log: These spawn with Glacia Trees. They can be double dropped with Skyroot Axes. When put in a crafting table they will provide 4 Glacia Planks.
lore.block.aether_redux.glacia_log_wall: Crafted from Glacia Logs. Can be used for decorative enclosures and defences. Great for keeping nasty intruders away!
lore.block.aether_redux.glacia_planks: Planks from the Glacia tree. Can be used as a building material, along with several other useful things.
lore.block.aether_redux.glacia_pressure_: Crafted from Glacia Planks. A wooden pressure plate used to activate mechanisms and redstone.
lore.block.aether_redux.glacia_sapling: The sapling of the Glacia tree. It can be grown by waiting or using Bone Meal.
lore.block.aether_redux.glacia_sign: Crafted from Glacia Planks. A helpful sign perfect for writing messages and directions on.
lore.block.aether_redux.glacia_slab: Crafted from Glacia Planks. Slabs are half blocks, versatile for decoration and smooth slopes. Try adding some to a building's roofing!
lore.block.aether_redux.glacia_stairs: Crafted from Glacia Planks. Stairs are useful for adding verticality to builds and are often used for decoration too!
lore.block.aether_redux.glacia_trapdoor: Crafted from Glacia Planks. Trapdoors are useful for covering entryways one block wide. They are often used to add extra protection to staircases.
lore.block.aether_redux.glacia_wood: Six-sided variant of Glacia Logs. When put in a crafting table they will provide 4 Glacia Planks.
lore.block.aether_redux.glacia_wood_wall: Crafted from Glacia Wood. Can be used for decorative enclosures and defences. Great for keeping nasty intruders away!
lore.block.aether_redux.glowy_holefire_s: The block lighting up the Lobotium Dungeon.
lore.block.aether_redux.golden_clover: A four-leaved clover found in the Gilded Groves. Makes a nice decoration, and can be placed in a flower pot!
lore.block.aether_redux.golden_leaf_pile: A pile of Golden Oak Leaves. These can be found under Golden Oak trees.
lore.block.aether_redux.golden_vines: A type of gold-colored vine that commonly grows under the leaves of Golden Oak trees.
lore.block.aether_redux.gravitite_block: A block of solid Gravitite. When powered with redstone, this will float!
lore.block.aether_redux.holefire_pillar: A pillar used in the construction of the Lobotium Dungeon.
lore.block.aether_redux.holefire_pillar_: The top part of the pillars in the Lobotium Dungeon.
lore.block.aether_redux.holefire_slab: Crafted from Holefire Stone. Slabs are half blocks, versatile for decoration and smooth slopes. Try adding some to a building's roofing!
lore.block.aether_redux.holefire_stairs: Crafted from Holefire Stone. Stairs are useful for adding verticality to builds and are often used for decoration too!
lore.block.aether_redux.holefire_stone: The main block making up the Lobotium Dungeon. It is warm to the touch.
lore.block.aether_redux.holefire_wall: Crafted from Holefire Stone. Can be used for decorative enclosures and defences. Great for keeping nasty intruders away!
lore.block.aether_redux.holysilt: Fine particles of broken up holystone and other minerals. Can be found underground, and around the blight. Careful, it's not very stable and may fall beneath your feet!
lore.block.aether_redux.infernia: A flower found on Gold Dungeons. Its petals are hot, like a flame
lore.block.aether_redux.iridia: An iridescent flower found in the Skyfields.
lore.block.aether_redux.jellyshroom: A gelatinous mushroom found in the Cowcaps and the Sugarfields.
lore.block.aether_redux.jellyshroom_book: A nice bookshelf made of Jelloshroom wood. These are nice for decoration, and also will enhance the abilities of Enchanting Tables!
lore.block.aether_redux.jellyshroom_butt: Crafted from Jelloshroom Planks, a button used to activate mechanisms and redstone.
lore.block.aether_redux.jellyshroom_door: Crafted from Jelloshroom Planks. Doors are an ornate entrance helpful for keeping an enclosed and safe space without worry of monsters wandering in!
lore.block.aether_redux.jellyshroom_fenc: Crafted from Jelloshroom Planks and Skyroot Sticks. Fences are great for keeping your livestock safe from wandering predators!
Crafted from Jelloshroom Planks and Skyroot Sticks. Fence gates give a homely entrance and exit to your precious enclosures.
lore.block.aether_redux.jellyshroom_hang: Crafted from Jelloshroom Planks. A helpful hanging sign perfect for writing messages and directions on.
lore.block.aether_redux.jellyshroom_hyph: Six-sided variant of Jelloshroom Stems. When put in a crafting table they will provide 4 Jelloshroom Planks.
Crafted from Jelloshroom Hyphae. Can be used for decorative enclosures and defences. Great for keeping nasty intruders away!
lore.block.aether_redux.jellyshroom_jell: Jelly from a large Jelloshroom, which can be found in the Cowcaps.
lore.block.aether_redux.jellyshroom_plan: Planks from the Jelloshroom tree. Can be used as a building material, along with several other useful things.
lore.block.aether_redux.jellyshroom_pres: Crafted from Jelloshroom Planks. A wooden pressure plate used to activate mechanisms and redstone.
lore.block.aether_redux.jellyshroom_sign: Crafted from Jelloshroom Planks. A helpful sign perfect for writing messages and directions on.
lore.block.aether_redux.jellyshroom_slab: Crafted from Jelloshroom Planks. Slabs are half blocks, versatile for decoration and smooth slopes. Try adding some to a building's roofing!
lore.block.aether_redux.jellyshroom_stai: Crafted from Jelloshroom Planks. Stairs are useful for adding verticality to builds and are often used for decoration too!
lore.block.aether_redux.jellyshroom_stem: These spawn with Jelloshroom Mushrooms. They can be double dropped with Skyroot Axes. When put in a crafting table they will provide 4 Jelloshroom Planks.
Crafted from Jelloshroom Stems. Can be used for decorative enclosures and defences. Great for keeping nasty intruders away!
lore.block.aether_redux.jellyshroom_trap: Crafted from Jelloshroom Planks. Trapdoors are useful for covering entryways one block wide. They are often used to add extra protection to staircases.
lore.block.aether_redux.lumina: A flower found in the Frosted Forests. It gives off a glow, lighting the area around it
lore.block.aether_redux.luxweed: A pretty glowing plant found in the Unblight biome. These are a relative of Wyndsprouts.
lore.block.aether_redux.minty_block: Six-sided variant of Minty Logs. When put in a crafting table they will provide 4 Minty Planks.
lore.block.aether_redux.minty_block_wall: Crafted from Minty Block. Can be used for decorative enclosures and defences. Great for keeping nasty intruders away!
lore.block.aether_redux.minty_bookshelf: A nice bookshelf made of Minty wood. These are nice for decoration, and also will enhance the abilities of Enchanting Tables!
lore.block.aether_redux.minty_button: Crafted from Minty Planks, a button used to activate mechanisms and redstone.
lore.block.aether_redux.minty_door: Crafted from Minty Planks. Doors are an ornate entrance helpful for keeping an enclosed and safe space without worry of monsters wandering in!
lore.block.aether_redux.minty_fence: Crafted from Minty Planks and Skyroot Sticks. Fences are great for keeping your livestock safe from wandering predators!
lore.block.aether_redux.minty_fence_gate: Crafted from Minty Planks and Skyroot Sticks. Fence gates give a homely entrance and exit to your precious enclosures.
lore.block.aether_redux.minty_hanging_si: Crafted from Minty Planks. A helpful hanging sign perfect for writing messages and directions on.
lore.block.aether_redux.minty_log: These spawn with Minty Trees. They can be double dropped with Skyroot Axes. When put in a crafting table they will provide 4 Minty Planks.
lore.block.aether_redux.minty_log_wall: Crafted from Minty Logs. Can be used for decorative enclosures and defences. Great for keeping nasty intruders away!
lore.block.aether_redux.minty_planks: Planks from the Minty tree. Can be used as a building material, along with several other useful things.
lore.block.aether_redux.minty_pressure_p: Crafted from Minty Planks. A wooden pressure plate used to activate mechanisms and redstone.
lore.block.aether_redux.minty_sign: Crafted from Minty Planks. A helpful sign perfect for writing messages and directions on.
lore.block.aether_redux.minty_slab: Crafted from Minty Planks. Slabs are half blocks, versatile for decoration and smooth slopes. Try adding some to a building's roofing!
lore.block.aether_redux.minty_stairs: Crafted from Minty Planks. Stairs are useful for adding verticality to builds and are often used for decoration too!
lore.block.aether_redux.minty_trapdoor: Crafted from Minty Planks. Trapdoors are useful for covering entryways one block wide. They are often used to add extra protection to staircases.
lore.block.aether_redux.peppermint_barkl: A small peppermint growth obtained by stripping a Peppermint Log. Can be grown with Bone Meal into a full-sized Candy Cane!
lore.block.aether_redux.peppermint_block: The all-sided variant of Peppermint Logs.
lore.block.aether_redux.peppermint_log: The logs of the large Candy Canes in the Sugarfields. This can be stripped into Minty Logs, or turned into Minty Planks!
lore.block.aether_redux.poprock_ore: An ore found in boulders made of Rock Candy. This will drop Lemon Poprocks when mined.
lore.block.aether_redux.prismatic_fields: The colorful leaves of the Prismatic Prismachromautomatic trees! These will occasionally drop Prismatic Prismachromautomatic Saplings.
The sapling of the Prismatic Prismachromautomatic tree. It can be grown by waiting or using Bone Meal.
lore.block.aether_redux.purple_crystal_f: A sapling of a Purple Crystal tree, with fruits on it. This can be grown with bonemeal.
lore.block.aether_redux.purple_glacia_le: The leaves of the purple variant of the Glacia tree. These sometimes drop Purple Glacia Saplings.
lore.block.aether_redux.purple_glacia_sa: The sapling of the purple variant of the Glacia tree. It can be grown by waiting or using Bone Meal.
lore.block.aether_redux.rainbow_aercloud: An insane, chromatic cloud type found in the Deeper Aether. Gives you a lot of speed.
lore.block.aether_redux.raw_gravitite_bl: A block of Raw Gravitite. This can be crafted with Raw Gravitite, and acts as a way to store more in a smaller space.
lore.block.aether_redux.raw_valkyrum_blo: A block of raw Valkyrum. This can be crafted from Raw Valkyrum.
lore.block.aether_redux.raw_veridium_blo: A block of raw Veridium. This can be crafted from Raw Veridium.
lore.block.aether_redux.rock_candy: A type of crystal found in clusters in the Sugarfields. Sometimes, you'll find Poprock Ore in these clumps!
lore.block.aether_redux.rock_candy_slab: Crafted from Rock Candy. Slabs are half blocks, versatile for decoration and smooth slopes. Try adding some to a building's roofing!
lore.block.aether_redux.rock_candy_stair: Crafted from Rock Candy. Stairs are useful for adding verticality to builds and are often used for decoration too!
lore.block.aether_redux.rock_candy_wall: Crafted from Rock Candy. Can be used for decorative enclosures and defences. Great for keeping nasty intruders away!
lore.block.aether_redux.rootrose: A flower found in the Deeper Aether biome. It almost seems like it could be a tree, if it really wanted to.
lore.block.aether_redux.sentrite: A dark rock found in the Aether. A mixture of this and holystone is what makes up the walls of the Bronze Dungeon.
lore.block.aether_redux.sentrite_brick_s: Crafted from Sentrite Bricks. Slabs are half blocks, versatile for decoration and smooth slopes. Try adding some to a building's roofing!
Crafted from Sentrite Bricks. Stairs are useful for adding verticality to builds and are often used for decoration too!
lore.block.aether_redux.sentrite_brick_w: Crafted from Sentrite Bricks. Can be used for decorative enclosures and defences. Great for keeping nasty intruders away!
lore.block.aether_redux.sentrite_bricks: Bricks made of Sentrite. These can be used as a nice building block!
lore.block.aether_redux.sentrite_slab: Crafted from Sentrite. Slabs are half blocks, versatile for decoration and smooth slopes. Try adding some to a building's roofing!
lore.block.aether_redux.sentrite_stairs: Crafted from Sentrite. Stairs are useful for adding verticality to builds and are often used for decoration too!
lore.block.aether_redux.sentrite_wall: Crafted from Sentrite. Can be used for decorative enclosures and defences. Great for keeping nasty intruders away!
lore.block.aether_redux.shell_shingle_sl: Crafted from Shell Shingles. Slabs are half blocks, versatile for decoration and smooth slopes. Try adding some to a building's roofing!
lore.block.aether_redux.shell_shingle_st: Crafted from Shell Shingles. Stairs are useful for adding verticality to builds and are often used for decoration too!
lore.block.aether_redux.shell_shingle_wa: Crafted from Shell Shingles. Can be used for decorative enclosures and defences. Great for keeping nasty intruders away!
lore.block.aether_redux.shell_shingles: Some nice shingles made from the shed shell of the Milkapod. This blast-resistant block can be placed by dispensers and broken by pistons.
lore.block.aether_redux.shimmerstool: A short mushroom found in the Cowcaps. These are most commonly found nearby rocks. They can also sometimes be found on the backs of the native Crazy Cow!
lore.block.aether_redux.short_aether_gra: Blades of the Aether's grass. It feels slightly cool to the touch.
lore.block.aether_redux.short_deep_grass: Blades of the Deeper Aether biome's shiny grass.
lore.block.aether_redux.skysprouts: A relative of the common Wyndsprouts, this flowering grass is found in the Skyfields.
lore.block.aether_redux.spectral_fieldsp: The colorful leaves of the Spectral Prismachromautomatic trees! These will occasionally drop Spectral Prismachromautomatic Saplings.
The sapling of the Spectral Prismachromautomatic tree. It can be grown by waiting or using Bone Meal.
lore.block.aether_redux.spirolyctil: A pretty purple flower found in the Unblight. It smells kinda like pickles.
lore.block.aether_redux.splitfern: A soft, fern-like plant with smooth leaves, with a split-end top.
lore.block.aether_redux.sporing_blightwi: This variant of the Heartwillow Log has spores on it, which it drops when mined with a Zanite Axe or better.
This variant of the Heartwillow Wood has spores on it, which it drops when mined with a Zanite Axe or better.
lore.block.aether_redux.stripped_blightw: A Heartwillow Log that has had its bark stripped away with an Axe. When put in a crafting table they will provide 4 Heartwillow Planks.
Crafted from Stripped Heartwillow Logs. Can be used for decorative enclosures and defences. Great for keeping nasty intruders away!
Heartwillow Wood that has had its bark stripped away with an Axe. When put in a crafting table they will provide 4 Heartwillow Planks.
Crafted from Stripped Heartwillow Wood. Can be used for decorative enclosures and defences. Great for keeping nasty intruders away!
lore.block.aether_redux.stripped_cloudca: Moocap Hyphae that has had its bark stripped away with an Axe. When put in a crafting table they will provide 4 Moocap Planks.
Crafted from Stripped Moocap Hyphae. Can be used for decorative enclosures and defences. Great for keeping nasty intruders away!
A Moocap Stem that has had its bark stripped away with an Axe. When put in a crafting table they will provide 4 Moocap Planks.
Crafted from Stripped Moocap Stems. Can be used for decorative enclosures and defences. Great for keeping nasty intruders away!
lore.block.aether_redux.stripped_crystal: A Crystal Log that has had its bark stripped away with an Axe. When put in a crafting table they will provide 4 Crystal Planks.
Crafted from Stripped Crystal Logs. Can be used for decorative enclosures and defences. Great for keeping nasty intruders away!
Crystal Wood that has had its bark stripped away with an Axe. When put in a crafting table they will provide 4 Crystal Planks.
Crafted from Stripped Crystal Wood. Can be used for decorative enclosures and defences. Great for keeping nasty intruders away!
lore.block.aether_redux.stripped_fieldsp: A Prismroot Log that has had its bark stripped away with an Axe. When put in a crafting table they will provide 4 Prismroot Planks.
Crafted from Stripped Prismroot Logs. Can be used for decorative enclosures and defences. Great for keeping nasty intruders away!
Prismroot Wood that has had its bark stripped away with an Axe. When put in a crafting table they will provide 4 Prismroot Planks.
Crafted from Stripped Prismroot Wood. Can be used for decorative enclosures and defences. Great for keeping nasty intruders away!
lore.block.aether_redux.stripped_glacia_: A Glacia Log that has had its bark stripped away with an Axe. When put in a crafting table they will provide 4 Glacia Planks.
Crafted from Stripped Glacia Logs. Can be used for decorative enclosures and defences. Great for keeping nasty intruders away!
Glacia Wood that has had its bark stripped away with an Axe. When put in a crafting table they will provide 4 Glacia Planks.
Crafted from Stripped Glacia Wood. Can be used for decorative enclosures and defences. Great for keeping nasty intruders away!
lore.block.aether_redux.sugargrass_block: sugar on some Cocoa Soil, how on earth this can exist naturally is unknown.
lore.block.aether_redux.sugarsprouts: Formations that grow out of the sugar crystals of Sugargrass. Despite being pure crystal, it is still referred to with a plant-like name.
lore.block.aether_redux.theratip: A flower found growing on coarse dirt in the Skyroot Shrublands. This plant's pretty pink flowers grow in clusters on the top of the stem.
lore.block.aether_redux.vanilla: Finally, after all these years, they added vanilla to the Aether!!!
lore.block.aether_redux.veridium_block: A block of pure Veridium. This can be crafted from Veridium Ingots.
lore.block.aether_redux.veridium_chain: A chain made of pure Veridium. This is crafted with a Veridium Ingot and two Veridium Nuggets.
lore.block.aether_redux.veridium_lantern: A lantern made of Veridium. You can place it on the ground or hang it on the ceiling!
lore.block.aether_redux.veridium_ore: The ore of Veridium. This can be found around the Aether
lore.block.aether_redux.wyndsprouts: A common plant found in the Aether. They occasionally drop Oats, the main edible source of grain in the Aether.
lore.block.aether_redux.xaelia_patch: A small patch of some chromatic flowers found in the Skyfields.
lore.block.aether_redux.zanberry_bush_st: The stem of the Zanberry Bush. This will grow into a full bush, and will have Zanberries, which can be picked!
lore.block.aether_redux.zyatrix: A purple, tulip-like flower found in the Gilded Grasslands. It shimmers in the moonlight!
lore.item.aether_redux.airbound_cape: A cape found in the Bronze Dungeon. It allows the wearer to double-jump!
lore.item.aether_redux.blightbunny_fang: The tooth of a Goodbunny. These can be used to make the Spear of Regeneration, which gives hit mobs regeneration!
lore.item.aether_redux.blightbunny_spawn: A spawn egg. Spawns a Goodbunny.
lore.item.aether_redux.blighted_spores: Some heart-shaped objects from the Hallowed tree. They can make some things into their nice versions, such as Mossy Holystone to Nicemoss Holystone
lore.item.aether_redux.blightwillow_boat: Crafted from Heartwillow Planks. While the Aether does not have many large bodies of water, a boat can occasionally be a useful tool for crossing large distances over ice!
lore.item.aether_redux.blightwillow_ches: A Heartwillow Boat with a handy chest in the back. Helpful for transporting more items over long stretches of water, which are famously difficult to find in the Aether.
lore.item.aether_redux.blue_swet_jelly: A delicious treat made with the remains of a Blue Swet.
lore.item.aether_redux.blueberry_bagel: A bagel made with Blue Berries. This is much more filling than a plain Wyndsprout Bagel
lore.item.aether_redux.blueberry_pie: A pie made of the Aether's native blueberries. These treats taste amazing, and can make a great gift for a friend.
lore.item.aether_redux.bundle_of_wyndspr: A bundle of grown Wyndsprouts. Flying Cows like to munch on these.
lore.item.aether_redux.cloudcap_boat: Crafted from Moocap Planks. While the Aether does not have many large bodies of water, a boat can occasionally be a useful tool for crossing large distances over ice!
lore.item.aether_redux.cloudcap_chest_bo: A Moocap Boat with a handy chest in the back. Helpful for transporting more items over long stretches of water, which are famously difficult to find in the Aether.
lore.item.aether_redux.cockatrice_feathe: A feather from a Cockatrice. This is said to do absolutely nothing. It can also be crafted into its upgraded variant, the Feather of Warding, which does even less nothing!
lore.item.aether_redux.crystal_boat: Crafted from Crystal Planks. While the Aether does not have many large bodies of water, a boat can occasionally be a useful tool for crossing large distances over ice!
lore.item.aether_redux.crystal_chest_boa: A Crystal Boat with a handy chest in the back. Helpful for transporting more items over long stretches of water, which are famously difficult to find in the Aether.
lore.item.aether_redux.enchanted_blueber: An enchanted variant of the Blueberry Pie. This fancy treat gives you a short regeneration effect!
lore.item.aether_redux.enchanted_ring: A ring with a large amount of magical potential. You can use it to craft many other types of rings with a variety of abilities!
lore.item.aether_redux.feather_of_wardin: The upgraded variant of the Cockatrice Feather. While having all the benefits of its less powerful version, this also gives the wearer immunity to Inebriation!
lore.item.aether_redux.fieldsproot_boat: Crafted from Prismroot Planks. While the Aether does not have many large bodies of water, a boat can occasionally be a useful tool for crossing large distances over ice!
lore.item.aether_redux.fieldsproot_chest: A Prismroot Boat with a handy chest in the back. Helpful for transporting more items over long stretches of water, which are famously difficult to find in the Aether.

lore.item.aether_redux.glacia_boat: Crafted from Glacia Planks. While the Aether does not have many large bodies of water, a boat can occasionally be a useful tool for crossing large distances over ice!
lore.item.aether_redux.glacia_chest_boat: A Glacia Boat with a handy chest in the back. Helpful for transporting more items over long stretches of water, which are famously difficult to find in the Aether.
lore.item.aether_redux.golden_swet_ball: A glowing, gooey orb of a Golden Swet's gel.
lore.item.aether_redux.golden_swet_jelly: A delicious treat made with the remains of a Golden Swet.
lore.item.aether_redux.grand_victory_med: A pendant dropped by the Valkyrie Queen. In Valkyrie culture, having one of these shows you are a noble warrior.
lore.item.aether_redux.gravitite_ingot: After putting Gravitite Ore into an Altar and enchanting it, you get a Gravitite Ingot. This can be made into gravitite tools and armor.
lore.item.aether_redux.infused_veridium_: An axe made of Veridium. This can be infused by right-clicking with an Ambrosium Shard to make it far more powerful for a short time!
A Dart Shooter which shoots Veridium Darts. This can be infused, by right-clicking it with an ambrosium shard!
A hoe made of Veridium. This can be infused by right-clicking with an Ambrosium Shard to make it far more powerful for a short time!
A pickaxe made of Veridium. This can be infused by right-clicking with an Ambrosium Shard to make it far more powerful for a short time!
A shovel made of Veridium. This can be infused by right-clicking with an Ambrosium Shard to make it far more powerful for a short time!
A sword made of Veridium. This can be infused by right-clicking with an Ambrosium Shard to make it far more powerful for a short time!
lore.item.aether_redux.jellyshroom_boat: Crafted from Jelloshroom Planks. While the Aether does not have many large bodies of water, a boat can occasionally be a useful tool for crossing large distances over ice!
lore.item.aether_redux.jellyshroom_chest: A Jelloshroom Boat with a handy chest in the back. Helpful for transporting more items over long stretches of water, which are famously difficult to find in the Aether.
lore.item.aether_redux.lemon_poprocks: Some delicious poprocks found in the Sugarfields!
lore.item.aether_redux.lightroot_clump: A clump of the glowing roots that grow in the Cowcaps. These can be eaten, and give night vision.
lore.item.aether_redux.minty_boat: Crafted from Minty Planks. While the Aether does not have many large bodies of water, a boat can occasionally be a useful tool for crossing large distances over ice!
lore.item.aether_redux.minty_chest_boat: A Minty Boat with a handy chest in the back. Helpful for transporting more items over long stretches of water, which are famously difficult to find in the Aether.
lore.item.aether_redux.mouse_ear_soup: Mouse Ear Soup is a surprisingly good dish, but it will certainly not get you praise from most. However, while most people will raise their eyebrows wondering why in Veradex you have leather ears in a bowl of water, a select few will recognize your true culinary genious, gaining you their utmost and complete respect.
lore.item.aether_redux.mykapod_shell_chu: A fragment of the outer layer of a Milkapod. Can be used to craft the Snailshell Shield!
lore.item.aether_redux.mykapod_spawn_egg: A spawn egg. Spawns a Milkapod.
lore.item.aether_redux.oatmeal: A nice bowl of Oatmeal, made with Wyndsprout Seeds.
lore.item.aether_redux.raw_gravitite: A chunk of the Aether's pink Gravitite. This can be enchanted at an Altar, and turned into armor and tools with gravity-based abilities!
lore.item.aether_redux.raw_valkyrum: A chunk of a very rare ore, mined with the Pickaxe of Arkenzus. This can be used to make Valkyrum Ingots, which can be turned into Valkyrum armor, weapons, and tools!
lore.item.aether_redux.raw_veridium: A chunk of Raw Veridium. This can be smelted into an ingot.
lore.item.aether_redux.ring_of_wisdom: One of many variations of the enchanted ring, this one is crafted using Holystone and a strange green crystal not native to the Aether, known as an Emerald
lore.item.aether_redux.sentry_chip: A circuitboard piece from a Sentry. Nobody knows who created these, just that the Valkyries have utilized them for all of recorded history.
lore.item.aether_redux.sentry_ring: One of many different variations of the enchanted ring. When worn, hitting mobs will release buring blue embers that can strike nearby mobs!
lore.item.aether_redux.shimmercow_spawn_: A spawn egg. Spawns a Crazy Cow.
lore.item.aether_redux.shroom_ring: One of many different variations of the enchanted ring. When worn, taking damage with low health will have a chance to give an Adrenaline effect, giving a temporary stat boost in turn for a stat debuff when it expires.
lore.item.aether_redux.skybud: A flower bud from some fully grown Skysprouts. Can be used to make some nice Flower Garland!
lore.item.aether_redux.skysprout_seeds: Some seeds from the wild Skysprout plant. Can be grown and harvested for a drop that makes some decoration blocks.
lore.item.aether_redux.slider_music_disc: A music disc that plays Labyrinth's Vengeance by Emile van Krieken. These are dropped on occasion when a Sentry kills another Sentry.
lore.item.aether_redux.snailshell_shield: A shield accessory. When worn, you will not take any knockback.
lore.item.aether_redux.solar_emblem: An ancient emblem once used by followers of the Sun Spirit. It allows the wearer to shoot fireballs!
lore.item.aether_redux.spear_of_the_blig: A spear crafted with a Goodbunny Tooth, Skyroot Stick, and Zanite Gemstone. This nifty tool can be used to inflict Regeneration on enemies! It's not very useful against most mobs, but for undead ones it's nice, and it can be used to heal allies as well.
lore.item.aether_redux.subzero_crossbow: An icy crossbow found in Gold Dungeons. This slows enemies when they are hit.
lore.item.aether_redux.vampire_amulet: A pendant found in Bronze Dungeon reward chests. It gives the wearer life steal at night, but decreases their damage resistance at day
lore.item.aether_redux.vanilla_gummy_swe: A sweet smelling gummy, it can be found in random chests in Bronze and Silver dungeons. It restores the player's hunger to full. Very useful for boss fights.
lore.item.aether_redux.vanilla_swet_ball: A gooey, sweet-smelling orb of a Vanilla Swet's gel. True to the name, this smells like vanilla.
lore.item.aether_redux.vanilla_swet_jell: A delicious treat made with the remains of a Vanilla Swet.
lore.item.aether_redux.vanilla_swet_spaw: A spawn egg. Spawns a Vanilla Swet.
lore.item.aether_redux.veridium_axe: An axe made of Veridium. This can be infused by right-clicking with an Ambrosium Shard to make it far more powerful for a short time!
lore.item.aether_redux.veridium_dart: The ammo for the Veridium Dart Shooter. When shot with an Infused Veridium Dart Shooter, hit enemies will glow!
lore.item.aether_redux.veridium_dart_sho: A Dart Shooter which shoots Veridium Darts. This can be infused, by right-clicking it with an ambrosium shard!
lore.item.aether_redux.veridium_hoe: A hoe made of Veridium. This can be infused by right-clicking with an Ambrosium Shard to make it far more powerful for a short time!
lore.item.aether_redux.veridium_ingot: An bar of pure Veridium, a metal that when coming in contact with ambrosium, takes on a glowing light blue color, strengthening temporarily.
lore.item.aether_redux.veridium_nugget: A small chunk of Veridium. This can be crafted to and from Veridium Ingots.
lore.item.aether_redux.veridium_pickaxe: A pickaxe made of Veridium. This can be infused by right-clicking with an Ambrosium Shard to make it far more powerful for a short time!
lore.item.aether_redux.veridium_shovel: A shovel made of Veridium. This can be infused by right-clicking with an Ambrosium Shard to make it far more powerful for a short time!
lore.item.aether_redux.veridium_sword: A sword made of Veridium. This can be infused by right-clicking with an Ambrosium Shard to make it far more powerful for a short time!
lore.item.aether_redux.wyndsprout_bagel: A nice bagel made of cultivated Wyndsprouts.
lore.item.aether_redux.wyndsprout_seeds: Some seeds from the wild Wyndsprout plant. Can be grown or eaten.
lore.item.aether_redux.zanberry: A type of berry found on bushes in the Skyroot Shrublands. This can be eaten, and nourishes slightly more hunger than Blueberries.
pack.aether_redux.overrides.description: Configurable overrides for the Aether: Redux
pack.aether_redux.overrides.title: Redux - Aether Overrides
subtitles.aether_redux.block.fungus_boun: Springjelly Shroom bounces with its Spring Jelly
